title: Beads ready-work ordering via topological sort
description: Define and implement dependency-aware ordering for ready work (topological sort with deterministic tie-breakers).

title: Spec ordering algorithm for ready tasks
description: Define topo-sort-based ordering using bd JSON data; specify tie-breakers (priority, age, label) and output format.
acceptance_criteria: Spec or notes describe algorithm and tie-breaker order with an example.

title: Implement ordering script (bd JSON -> topo order)
description: Build script to call bd JSON output, filter ready work, apply topo ordering, and emit JSON/Markdown for dashboards.
acceptance_criteria: Script under scripts/ with usage + sample output.

title: Document ordering workflow for teams
description: Update team ops/AGENTS to include the new ordered-ready workflow and command usage.
acceptance_criteria: Docs updated with commands and explanation.

title: Stand up Cognitive Architecture Team (Act-Learn-Reuse loop)
description: Create the team backbone for meta-agentics: loop spec, memory graph, tool interfaces, and eval harness.

title: Define Act-Learn-Reuse loop spec and success metrics
description: Document loop stages, data artifacts, and scoring metrics for pass/fail, with a sample trace.
acceptance_criteria: Spec includes loop diagram, metric definitions, and example trace inputs/outputs.

title: Design knowledge graph schema + retrieval policy
description: Define ontology nodes/edges, indexing rules, and retrieval strategy for expert memory.
acceptance_criteria: Schema doc includes entity types, relations, and query examples.

title: Draft tool interface registry + structured output schema
description: Inventory agent tools and define strict schemas (OpenAPI/function signatures) with error-handling rules.
acceptance_criteria: Registry lists tools with JSON schema + error format.

title: Build evaluation harness plan (robustness + safety)
description: Define automated eval suites, adversarial cases, and regression thresholds for agent behavior.
acceptance_criteria: Plan includes metrics, datasets, and gating thresholds.
